title: Input schema of the Movie shooting locations scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Seed pages to start crawling from (IMDb filming locations pages, Wikipedia film pages, local film commission directories).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of HTTP requests that can be made by this crawler.

useBrowser.title: Use Playwright (for JS-heavy pages)
useBrowser.description: If true, use PlaywrightCrawler for pages which require JS rendering (slower but more accurate).

useWikipediaApi.title: Use Wikipedia API for enrichment
useWikipediaApi.description: If true, attempt to fetch and parse the Wikipedia API (MediaWiki) version of pages for cleaner 'Filming locations' extraction.

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each start URL.

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of parallel requests (CheerioCrawler). Lower for politeness.

validateCoordinates.title: Validate coordinates (reverse geocode)
validateCoordinates.description: If true, optionally call a geocoding service to validate/extract city/country from coordinates. (Not included; placeholder for integration.)
